page.title: 04Tourism in Appleby
page.content: Tourists come to Appleby for a number of reasons,including the castle,the church,Holme Wood Nature Trail and as a centre to explore the Eden Valley and the Lake District. Tourist pick out Appleby because it is very beautiful and it is near some very nice places to walk. They some times come and stay in hotels and camp sites because there are some very nice camp sites near Appleby and it is nice in the summer to sleep in a tent.Some times tourist just come for the day and go sight seeing or shoping.Appleby is the centre of lots of little villages. Some times people come to Appleby on the train.The Appleby railway line is a little bit spcial because it is the Settle to Carlisle which is very beautiful and in danger of closure. Rosie Harrison
